definitions.definition: An enclosed area used to hold bulls .
examples: Magnus and Big Dick are over in the bullpen , ready for tonight's rodeo.

definitions.definition: An enclosed area for pitchers to warm up in during a game.
examples: After that hit, there is activity in the bullpen .

definitions.definition: The relief pitchers of a team collectively.
examples: Their bullpen is worn out after yesterday's doubleheader where both games went 12 innings.

definitions.definition: A place for someone or something to get ready.
examples: If this team of consultants fails, I have another warming up in the bullpen .

definitions.definition: An open seating arrangement where project teams can communicate openly with minimal effort.
examples: We have our sales team in a bullpen setup to keep their energy flowing.

definitions.definition: A military prison or its enclosing stockade .

main_definition: An enclosed area used to hold bulls .
secondary_definitions: ( baseball ) An enclosed area for pitchers to warm up in during a game.
( baseball ) The relief pitchers of a team collectively.
( figurative ) A place for someone or something to get ready.
An open seating arrangement where project teams can communicate openly with minimal effort.
( US , military slang ) A military prison or its enclosing stockade .
